articles.description: Aston Villa have been handed a double injury setback ahead of their game against Liverpool later this evening.
articles.content:

What’s the latest?

articles.author: Kate Mcgreavy
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand slams Manchester United for 'weak-minded changing room' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ralf Rangnick's side hit a new low on Saturday  when they were humiliated in a 4-0 thrashing by Brighton. The defeat means United will finish with their lowest points tally in the post-1992 era.
articles.content: Rio Ferdinand has not held back in his latest criticism of Manchester United's faltering stars as he labelled the dressing room 'weak-minded' and insisted their leaders should be singling out others … [+5046 chars]
